articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: OpenAI pulls its Scarlett Johansson-like voice for ChatGPT - The Verge
articles.description: OpenAI is now pausing its “Sky” voice profile for its new GPT-4o model chatbot after users noted it sounds remarkably similar to actor Scarlett Johansson.
articles.content:
OpenAI pulls its Scarlett Johansson-like voice for ChatGPT
OpenAI pulls its Scarlett Johansson-like voice for ChatGPT
